document_data.name: Malaph Serpentshield
document_data.mainbody:
'''Malaph Serpentshield''' was a [[human]] man and a lord in the [[village]] of [[Dark Hollow]] in [[the Vast]] around [[1370 DR]].

He was a retired [[adventurer]] and one of the wealthiest of the petty lords in the area.
